prompt: A captivating illustration of a Luminous Frog perched on a glowing lily pad amidst the Mystic Swamp. Its skin is adorned with bioluminescent patterns that cast a soft, magical light around it. The mist swirls gently in the background, obscuring the towering ancient trees and their gnarled roots winding into the swampy water. Delicate fireflies add to the enchanting atmosphere as they hover around the frog.
